item.description: Let's get together and play some cut-throat croquet. We also have boules, as a lawn game alternative. :) I will be preparing sangria, soft drinks, and hors d'oeuvres, but if you want something else to drink, please feel free to bring it. The outdoor games are, of course, weather dependent. If it rains, we'll just move inside for table-top games.
item.name: Croquet Soiree@ Victoria's
